turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yeah, Peet's Coffee and espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you have a location in mind?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i look some up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh, i got it too, great!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, so I know what I want. I want a coconut black Thai, a cold-brew, coconut black Thai. And I'll pick it the heck up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I cannot find a coconut black thai on Peet's coffee, is there maybe something else you'd like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coffee, just an cold-brew iced coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking at the menu. I'm looking at their freaking menu right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I apologize, maybe their online menu is limited.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, then I'll just take an espresso to go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it with almond milk and sugar substitute.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: an Espresso with almond milk, and sugar substitute, like splenda?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay! one moment while i send it over.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all set! your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Alright. That's all. Thanks. Bye.
